auth.confirmation_mail_sent_prompt: A new confirmation email has been sent to %s, please check your inbox within the next %d hours to complete the registration process.
auth.disable_register_mail: Sorry, email services are disabled. Please contact the site administrator.
auth.disable_register_prompt: Sorry, registration has been disabled. Please contact the site administrator.
auth.has_unconfirmed_mail: Hi %s, you have an unconfirmed email address (%s). If you haven't received a confirmation email or need to resend a new one, please click on the button below.
auth.invalid_code: Sorry, your confirmation code has expired or not valid.
auth.login_two_factor_invalid_recovery_code: Recovery code has been used or does not valid.
auth.non_local_account: Non-local accounts cannot change passwords through Gogs.
auth.password_too_short: Password length cannot be less then 6.
auth.prohibit_login_desc: Your account is prohibited to login, please contact site admin.
auth.register_hepler_msg: Already have an account? Sign in now!
auth.resend_mail: Click here to resend your activation email
auth.resent_limit_prompt: Sorry, you already requested an activation email recently. Please wait 3 minutes then try again.
auth.reset_password_helper: Click here to reset your password
auth.send_reset_mail: Click here to (re)send your password reset email
auth.sign_up_now: Need an account? Sign up now.
auth.social_register_hepler_msg: Already have an account? Bind now!
